howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.subheading: From sign-up to closing, REOS guides you through every step of the investment process.

step1.title: Create Your Account
step1.description: Sign up and complete your investor profile to receive personalized property recommendations.

step2.title: Discover Properties
step2.description: Browse vetted Israeli real estate opportunities with AI-powered search and smart filters.

step3.title: Connect with Experts
step3.description: Get matched with verified brokers, mortgage advisors, and lawyers who specialize in your market.

step4.title: Close Your Deal
step4.description: Track every stage from offer to closing with full platform support and real-time updates.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions

questions.question: Is REOS a licensed real estate platform?
questions.answer: REOS is a technology platform that connects US investors with vetted Israeli real estate professionals. All transactions are conducted through licensed brokers, lawyers, and mortgage advisors who are independently verified.

questions.question: How are service providers vetted?
questions.answer: Every service provider on REOS undergoes a thorough verification process including license validation, professional references, track record review, and ongoing performance monitoring through client ratings and reviews.

questions.question: Is my personal information secure?
questions.answer: Yes. REOS uses industry-standard encryption and secure data handling practices. Your personal and financial information is protected in compliance with GDPR and CCPA regulations. We never share your data with third parties without your explicit consent.

questions.question: How do I start investing in Israeli real estate?
questions.answer: Simply create an account, complete your investor profile, and our AI will recommend properties matching your criteria. You can also browse all listings and use our smart search to find specific opportunities. Once you find a property, we connect you with the right professionals.

questions.question: What types of properties are available?
questions.answer: REOS features residential, commercial, and mixed-use properties across Israel's major cities including Tel Aviv, Jerusalem, Haifa, and Herzliya. Properties range from new developments to established investment opportunities.

questions.question: How long does a typical transaction take?
questions.answer: Timeline varies by property type and complexity, but most transactions complete within 60-90 days. REOS tracks every stage from initial interest through closing, keeping you informed with real-time updates throughout the process.

questions.question: Can I invest remotely from the US?
questions.answer: Absolutely. REOS is designed specifically for cross-border investment. Our platform handles the entire process digitally, and your assigned service providers manage all local requirements. You can track everything from your dashboard without traveling.

questions.question: Is REOS free for investors?
questions.answer: Yes, REOS is completely free for investors. There are no platform fees, subscription costs, or hidden charges. Service provider fees (broker commissions, legal fees, etc.) are standard market rates disclosed upfront before you commit.

questions.question: What are the typical costs of investing in Israeli real estate?
questions.answer: Costs include the property price, purchase tax (3.5-10% depending on property value), legal fees (typically 1-1.5% of purchase price), broker commission (1-2%), and mortgage arrangement fees if financing. REOS provides full cost breakdowns before you commit.

questions.question: Are there financing options available?
questions.answer: Yes. Through our network of verified mortgage advisors, you can access Israeli mortgage options typically covering up to 50-75% of the property value for foreign investors. Our advisors help you find the best rates and terms.

questions.question: What types of service providers can join REOS?
questions.answer: REOS welcomes licensed real estate brokers, mortgage advisors, lawyers specializing in real estate transactions, appraisers, notaries, accountants, and tax consultants. Each provider type has a dedicated dashboard and workflow.

questions.question: How does the deal handoff process work?
questions.answer: When an investor progresses through their purchase journey, REOS automatically routes them to the next service provider in the flow. For example, after a broker secures a deal, the system connects the investor with a mortgage advisor and lawyer. You receive warm, qualified leads with full context.

questions.question: Can I manage my existing clients on REOS?
questions.answer: Yes. REOS includes a full client management system where you can track active deals, manage communications, share documents, and monitor deal progress — all in one place alongside new platform-generated leads.

questions.question: How are leads matched to service providers?
questions.answer: Our matching algorithm considers your specialization areas, geographic coverage, language capabilities, availability, and client ratings. Investors are connected with providers who best match their specific needs and preferences.

questions.question: What quality of leads can I expect?
questions.answer: REOS leads are pre-qualified investors who have completed their profiles and expressed genuine interest in specific properties. Unlike cold leads, these investors are actively looking to purchase and have been matched to you based on compatibility.

questions.question: How much does REOS cost for service providers?
questions.answer: REOS currently offers free access during our growth phase. We plan to introduce professional tiers with enhanced features such as priority lead matching, advanced analytics, and marketing tools. Early adopters will receive preferential pricing.

questions.question: Is there a commission or referral fee?
questions.answer: During our launch phase, there are no platform commission fees. Your standard professional fees are between you and your clients. We'll communicate any future changes well in advance with grandfathered terms for early providers.

faq.contactDescription: Our team is happy to help with any questions about investing in Israeli real estate or joining as a service provider.

meta.title: Privacy Policy | REOS
meta.description: Learn how REOS collects, uses, and protects your personal information. Our privacy policy covers CCPA, GDPR, and Israeli privacy law compliance.

introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.content: REOS ("we", "our", or "us") operates the REOS platform (reos.app), a real estate operating system connecting US investors with Israeli properties. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform. We are committed to protecting your privacy in compliance with applicable laws including the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA/CPRA), General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), and Israeli Protection of Privacy Law (PPL).

whatWeCollect.heading: Personal Information You Provide
whatWeCollect.content: When you create an account or use our services, we may collect: your name and email address, phone number (optional), investment preferences and risk tolerance, professional credentials (for service providers), property search history and saved properties, chat messages and communications, and financial preferences (budget range, investment goals).

automaticData.heading: Information Collected Automatically
automaticData.content: We automatically collect: device and browser information, IP address and approximate location, usage data (pages visited, features used, time spent), cookies and similar tracking technologies, and language and locale preferences.

dataUse.heading: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.content: We use your information to: provide and maintain the REOS platform, match investors with suitable properties and service providers, process AI-powered property recommendations and search, facilitate communications between investors and service providers, improve our platform and develop new features, send notifications about deal updates and new listings, comply with legal obligations, and prevent fraud and ensure platform security.

dataProcessors.heading: Data Processors and Sub-Processors
dataProcessors.content: We use the following third-party services to process your data:

processors.clerk: Clerk (authentication and identity management) — US-based, SOC 2 Type II certified
processors.convex: Convex (database and real-time backend) — US-based, SOC 2 compliant
processors.anthropic: Anthropic (AI-powered features including property search and recommendations) — US-based, responsible AI practices

dataProcessors.note: Each processor is contractually bound to process data only as instructed and to maintain appropriate security measures.

crossBorder.heading: Cross-Border Data Transfers
crossBorder.content: REOS operates across the United States and Israel. Your data may be transferred between these jurisdictions. For transfers from the EU/EEA, we rely on Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) as approved by the European Commission. Israel has been recognized by the European Commission as providing an adequate level of data protection. For US-Israel transfers, we implement appropriate safeguards consistent with the Israeli Protection of Privacy Law and applicable US state privacy laws.

dataSharing.heading: Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with: service providers you choose to connect with through the platform, our data processors listed above, law enforcement when required by law, and in connection with a business transfer (merger, acquisition, or sale of assets). When you request a service provider (broker, mortgage advisor, or lawyer), your relevant profile information is shared with that provider to facilitate the service.

yourRights.heading: Your Privacy Rights
yourRights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

ccpa.heading: California Residents (CCPA/CPRA)
ccpa.content: Right to know what personal information we collect and how it is used, right to delete your personal information, right to opt-out of the sale or sharing of personal information (we do not sell data), right to non-discrimination for exercising your rights, right to correct inaccurate personal information, and right to limit use of sensitive personal information.

gdpr.heading: EU/EEA Residents (GDPR)
gdpr.content: Right of access to your personal data, right to rectification of inaccurate data, right to erasure (right to be forgotten), right to restrict processing, right to data portability, and right to object to processing.

israel.heading: Israeli Residents
israel.content: Right to access your personal data held in our databases, right to request correction of inaccurate data, and right to request deletion of data no longer needed for the purpose it was collected.

dataSecurity.heading: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information, including encryption in transit (TLS/SSL) and at rest, access controls and authentication, regular security assessments, and employee training on data protection.

cookies.heading: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for authentication and session management. We use analytics cookies to understand platform usage and improve our services. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings. For details on specific cookies, see our Cookie Notice.

retention.heading: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. Deal and transaction records are retained for 7 years for legal compliance. You may request deletion of your account and associated data at any time by contacting us.

children.heading: Children's Privacy
children.content: REOS is not intended for users under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we learn we have collected data from a child under 18, we will delete it promptly.

changes.heading: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of material changes by posting the updated policy on our platform and updating the "Last updated" date. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, contact us at: privacy@reos.app

meta.title: Terms of Service | REOS
meta.description: Read the REOS Terms of Service covering platform use, investor and provider obligations, and legal agreements.

introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to REOS (reos.app), a real estate operating system connecting US investors with Israeli properties and qualified service providers. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the REOS platform. By accessing or using REOS, you agree to be bound by these Terms. REOS is operated by REOS Inc., a Delaware corporation with operations in the United States and Israel.

eligibility.heading: Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 18 years of age to use REOS. To access investment features, you must be a US or Israeli resident or citizen. Service providers must possess all required professional licenses and certifications in their jurisdiction. By using REOS, you represent and warrant that you meet these eligibility requirements.

accountTerms.heading: Account Terms
accountTerms.content: You must provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials. You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access to your account. You may not transfer or sell your REOS account to another party.

platformUse.heading: Platform Use and Restrictions
platformUse.content: You may use REOS to search for properties, connect with service providers, manage real estate transactions, and communicate with other platform users. You may not: use REOS for any illegal purpose or in violation of any laws, impersonate any person or entity or falsely state your affiliation, scrape, harvest, or collect data from REOS using automated means without permission, interfere with or disrupt the platform or servers, attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the platform, transmit viruses, malware, or other malicious code, or violate any intellectual property rights.

investorTerms.heading: Terms for Investors
investorTerms.content: REOS is a technology platform connecting investors with properties and service providers. REOS does not provide investment advice, financial advice, or legal advice. All property information is provided for informational purposes only and may not be accurate or complete. You are solely responsible for conducting your own due diligence before making any investment decision. Real estate investments carry inherent risks including loss of capital. Past performance does not guarantee future results. You should consult with qualified financial, legal, and tax advisors before investing.

providerTerms.heading: Terms for Service Providers
providerTerms.content: Service providers using REOS must: maintain all required professional licenses and certifications, provide accurate information about qualifications and experience, respond to investor inquiries in a timely and professional manner, comply with all applicable laws and professional standards, maintain professional liability insurance as required by law, and disclose any conflicts of interest. REOS reserves the right to verify credentials and remove providers who fail to meet professional standards.

intellectualProperty.heading: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: REOS and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by REOS Inc. and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws. You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use REOS for its intended purpose. You retain ownership of content you submit to REOS (messages, profile information, etc.). By submitting content, you grant REOS a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, and display your content solely to operate and improve the platform.

userContent.heading: User Content and Conduct
userContent.content: You are solely responsible for content you post on REOS. You represent that you have all necessary rights to post your content. REOS reserves the right to remove any content that violates these Terms or is otherwise objectionable. You may not post content that is illegal, fraudulent, defamatory, harassing, or violates any third-party rights.

disclaimer.heading: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: REOS is provided "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied. We do not warrant that REOS will be uninterrupted, error-free, or secure. We do not warrant the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any property information, valuations, or investment projections. We do not guarantee any specific investment results or returns. Your use of REOS is at your sole risk.

limitationOfLiability.heading: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, REOS Inc., its officers, directors, employees, and agents shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including loss of profits, revenue, data, or investment losses, arising from your use of REOS. Our total liability to you for any claims arising from these Terms or your use of REOS shall not exceed the amount you paid to REOS in the 12 months preceding the claim, or $100 if you have not paid any fees.

indemnification.heading: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless REOS Inc. and its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses (including attorneys' fees) arising from: your use of REOS, your violation of these Terms, your violation of any rights of another party, or any content you submit to REOS.

termination.heading: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for any reason, including violation of these Terms. You may terminate your account at any time through your account settings. Upon termination, your right to use REOS ceases immediately. Provisions that by their nature should survive termination (including intellectual property, disclaimers, indemnification, and limitation of liability) shall survive.

governingLaw.heading: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLaw.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the State of New York, United States, without regard to conflict of law principles. For international transactions involving Israeli properties, Israeli law may also apply to specific aspects of the transaction. Any disputes shall be resolved in accordance with the Dispute Resolution section below.

disputeResolution.heading: Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.content: Any dispute arising from these Terms or your use of REOS shall be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the American Arbitration Association rules. Arbitration shall take place in New York, New York, or remotely by mutual agreement. You waive any right to participate in a class action lawsuit or class-wide arbitration. Notwithstanding the foregoing, either party may seek injunctive relief in court to protect intellectual property rights.

changes.heading: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify you of material changes by posting the updated Terms on REOS and updating the "Last updated" date. For material changes, we may also send email notification. Your continued use of REOS after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms. If you do not agree to the modified Terms, you must stop using REOS.

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, contact us at: legal@reos.app

meta.title: Pricing
meta.description: Compare REOS pricing plans for investors, providers, and enterprises. Start free, scale as you grow.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your real estate business. Start free, upgrade when you're ready.

investor.name: Investor
investor.description: Perfect for individual investors exploring Israeli real estate opportunities

provider.name: Provider
provider.description: For brokers, mortgage advisors, lawyers, and other service providers who serve real estate investors

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For agencies and teams requiring custom solutions and dedicated support

questions.question: Is there a free trial?
questions.answer: Yes! The Provider plan includes a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start.

questions.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
questions.answer: Absolutely. You can change your plan at any time. When upgrading, you'll be prorated for the remainder of your billing cycle. When downgrading, the change takes effect at your next billing date.

questions.question: What happens if I cancel?
questions.answer: You can cancel anytime. Your access continues until the end of your current billing period. Your data is retained for 30 days after cancellation in case you change your mind.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and bank transfers for annual plans.

questions.question: How does Enterprise pricing work?
questions.answer: Enterprise pricing is customized based on team size, volume, and specific requirements. Contact our sales team for a personalized quote.

questions.question: Do you offer refunds?
questions.answer: We offer a full refund within the first 14 days of any paid plan. After that, you can cancel anytime but refunds are not provided for partial billing periods.

index.title: Service providers you can trust

broker.name: Real Estate Broker
broker.shortDescription: Help US investors find and acquire the best Israeli properties through local market expertise.

meta.description: Join REOS as a real estate broker and connect with qualified US investors seeking Israeli property.

broker.heroTitle: Grow your brokerage with qualified US investors
broker.heroDescription: REOS brings you a steady pipeline of US-based investors actively looking for Israeli real estate. List your services, showcase your track record, and close more deals.

benefits.description: Receive inquiries from verified US investors who are ready to buy, not just browse. Our platform filters for serious buyers so you can focus on closing.

benefits.title: Showcase your portfolio
benefits.description: Build a professional profile highlighting your listings, past transactions, and client reviews — all visible to investors searching for brokers on REOS.

benefits.title: Streamlined deal management
benefits.description: Track every deal from first inquiry to closing with built-in CRM tools. Manage documents, coordinate with other providers, and keep investors updated in one place.

steps.title: Create your provider profile
steps.description: Sign up, verify your license, and build your professional profile with your specialties, regions served, and past deals.

steps.title: Get matched with investors
steps.description: Our algorithm matches you with US investors based on their criteria — property type, budget, location, and timeline.

steps.title: Manage deals on the platform
steps.description: Use the REOS dashboard to communicate with investors, share listings, and coordinate with other service providers.

steps.title: Close and grow
steps.description: Complete transactions, collect reviews, and build your reputation. Top-rated brokers get featured placement and more leads.

broker.ctaDescription: Join hundreds of Israeli brokers already using REOS to connect with qualified US real estate investors.

testimonial.quote: REOS transformed my brokerage. The quality of investor leads is unmatched — I closed three deals in my first month.

mortgage-advisor.heroTitle: Help US investors finance their Israeli property

benefits.title: Cross-border expertise in demand

steps.title: Receive investor referrals
steps.description: Get matched with investors who have been pre-approved or are in the property search phase and need financing.

steps.title: Guide through closing
steps.description: Support investors from pre-approval to final disbursement, coordinating with brokers and lawyers on the platform.

mortgage-advisor.ctaDescription: US investors need experts like you to navigate Israeli financing. Start receiving referrals today.

testimonial.quote: Working with US investors through REOS has grown my practice significantly. The pre-qualified leads save me hours.

benefits.description: Highlight your expertise in US-Israel transactions, dual taxation, foreign buyer regulations, and title verification to attract the right clients.

steps.title: Get matched to transactions
steps.description: Investors and brokers search for lawyers by specialty, location, and language. Appear in results matching your profile.

steps.title: Close with confidence
steps.description: Manage the legal side of closing through REOS — signatures, transfers, and post-closing compliance all in one place.

lawyer.ctaDescription: US investors need legal protection in unfamiliar territory. Be the lawyer they trust.

testimonial.quote: The platform streamlines the entire legal process for cross-border transactions. My clients love the transparency.

appraiser.heroDescription: US investors need independent, reliable appraisals before purchasing Israeli property. Your local expertise gives them the confidence to invest.

benefits.description: Every financing deal and many cash purchases require an independent appraisal. Get a reliable stream of valuation requests.

benefits.description: Deliver appraisals in formats that satisfy both Israeli banks and US lenders, making your reports immediately useful.

steps.description: Receive valuation requests from investors, brokers, and mortgage advisors directly through the platform.

steps.title: Complete the appraisal

steps.description: Reliable turnaround and thorough reports earn top ratings and repeat business from the provider network.

appraiser.ctaTitle: Put your valuation expertise to work

testimonial.quote: REOS connects me with serious investors who value professional appraisals. The steady deal flow speaks for itself.
